title: £10 for 25Minute Garra Rufa Session For Two at Wonderfeet (£30 Value)
highlights:
• No need to book
  • Removes dead skin and can help to soften feet
  • Suitable for men and women

title: Spa Getaway for Two for One Night (£54) or Two Nights (£99) at Mercure Bolton Last Drop Village Hotel and Spa (Save up to 56%)
highlights:
• Chocolate and fudge box amenities for one-night stay - Bottle of wine in the room for two-night stay 
  • Breakfast included on both days
  • Full access to spa and leisure facilities, 25% discount on spa treatments 
  • 15% off food in the restaurant
  • Additional night carries 50% discount 
  • Close to local attractions

title: Six Sessions of IPL on One Standard Area (£69) or Half Leg (£99) at Es Paradis (Up to 86% Off)
highlights:
• Standard areas include upper lip, bikini, underarm and more 
  • Half Leg includes Upper or Lower Leg 
  • Patch test is included 
  • Short walk from Earlstown Rail Station
